title: (x) 'So you think you can Dance': oblique techno unicase - House 3009 Spaceport {self (Artslons via mamex@WTF Forum)}
content:
I need to know fonr for the text below

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100109023054im_/http:/typophile.com/files/22477-Show%20Choir%20front_4500.jpg)
author: artslons

comments.content: The ‘So you think you can’ part looks like a slanted DIN.
If you just need the vector logo, you can download it from [Wikipedia](http://web.archive.org/web/20100109023054/http:/upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/6/6f/So_You_Think_You_Can_Dance.svg).
Actually i need to replace “DANCE” with the letters “WJCI” so i need to know the font name....similar one will also work
